api_list.name: calculate emissions from cars
api_list.description:
Car emissions are calculated for rental cars based on it's acriss category that is shared across multiple retailers.

This categories are the following:
-    MINI
-    ECONOMY
-    COMPACT
-    INTERMEDIATE
-    STANDARD
-    FULLSIZE
-    PREMIUM
-    LUXURY
-   OVERSIZE
-    SPECIAL

In combination with the fuel type that could be one of the following:

-     PETROL
-     DIESEL
-     UNDEFINED
 -  HYBRID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoflow.p.rapidapi.com/estimate/cars-emissions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoflow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

headers = {

api_list.name: calculate emissions from flights
api_list.description:
Flight emissions are calculated taking into account the different space use by different classes

The available classes are the following:

    ECONOMY
    ECONOMY_PLUS
    BUSSINES
    FIRST
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ecoflow.p.rapidapi.com/estimate/flight-emissions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ecoflow.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
